Package CST8221C4

Class Connect4

  • java.lang.Object
    • CST8221C4.Connect4
  • public class Connect4
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents the View of the Connect 4 GUI. This class implements the look of the game, by adding the necessary components, labels, layout managers, menu items etc. This class also includes the implementation of the timer, and splash screen. This class also contains action listeners which are used to handle interactions with menu items and dropping token.

      • handleButtonClick

        private void handleButtonClick​(int column)
        This method is used to handle the user interaction with the button. Calls the validPlay method from the Controller class to check if play respects the game logic. If so, it increments the player moves.
        Parameters:
        column - , represents column on game board

      • addCenterPanel

        private void addCenterPanel​(javax.swing.JFrame frame)
        This method contains all GUI implementations on the center panel ( center side of frame). This method includes implementation of the board, and implements an action listener to handle user interactions with the buttons.
        Parameters:
        frame - , regards to the JFrame

      • PlayerTokenColor

        private java.awt.Color PlayerTokenColor​(int currentPlayer)
        This method implements the token colors for each player, setting player 1 with pink tokens , and player 2 with black tokens.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        returns the color of tokens for players

      • addMenuBar

        private void addMenuBar​(javax.swing.JFrame frame)
        This method contains all GUI implementations on the menu bar (north side of frame). This method includes implementation of menu items and contains action listener for each menu item, and calls the handleMenuEvents in the controller class to handle the events.
        Parameters:
        frame - , regards to the JFrame

      • addRightPanel

        private void addRightPanel​(javax.swing.JFrame frame)
        This method contains all GUI implementations on the right panel (east side of frame). This method includes implementation of the chat area.
        Parameters:
        frame - , regards to the JFrame
